short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures item images from the PoE Wiki.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a super simple extension that captures a png of the item on screen on poewiki.net and downloads it, designed for use by content creators to easily put items onscreen.

Updated 3/20/24: Now captures Keystones & Notables
